Posts.Content: Thank you so much for your advice. It's really helped me, I've got crazy anxiety as it is so I'm constantly worrying about her ( not to her face though, I'm trying to be strong)  She said she has to have it every three weeks, do you feel poorly all the time or do you get some good days? I have a chronic illness so I know how feeling poorly all the time can affect your mental health and I can't bare the thought of her having to endure that too.  Are you still doing chemo? I hope things are looking up for you, you sound like a strong lady. Thank you so much for sharing your story, Mica x
Posts.Title: Mum starting chemotherapy for her2 and I'm scared about how unwell...

Posts.Content: Congratulations on getting through it :) that's what mum has, full marks ! she's have chemotherapy and then boob off! I'm trying to get her to come on here because I know it would benefit not to just look at Google horror stories!  I will do I'll keep updating the journey. Thank you so much  Mica
Posts.Title: Mum starting chemotherapy for her2 and I'm scared about how unwell...

Posts.Content: Thanks You so much, this gives me alot of comfort and hope for her and I'll Make sure to show her these messages as they would really help her too.  Congratulations on battling through, keel fighting!  Mica
Posts.Title: Mum starting chemotherapy for her2 and I'm scared about how unwell...

Posts.Content: Thank you, it's just one of those things we have to overcome x
Posts.Title: Mum starting chemotherapy for her2 and I'm scared about how unwell...

Posts.Content: Hi karen, thank you I hate knowing she's unwell it genuinely hurts my heart. Thank you so much for sharing your story it will really bring her comfortable. Glad you got through it, much love. Mica xx

Posts.Content: Mum starts chemotherapy this week and she's already tired before she's started. What can I expect with how it will affect her, how can I help her deal with hair loss.  I just want to help her, thank you x
